Utils for Selenium Unit Tests using YML

Used to control YAML-Based Tests from CLI Be careful about Namespaces, as the PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase Is FULL of methods that will conflict, such as runTest(), doRun(), run(), etc... NOTE:: All Methods in class are Predicated with a Namespace Constraint Except setUp and tearDown
